20110112170643.000|20110112170644.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD MORNING TO    
20110112170644.000|20110112170644.000|CC1|YOU.                            
20110112170644.000|20110112170645.000|CC1|THE ONLY REASON YOU LAUGH AT ME
